spatial_accuracy.notes: General layout is strong. Minor displacement in the utility and kitchen partition wall. Windows in Bedroom-3 are slightly oversized compared to the plan.

structural_fidelity.notes: Excellent room adjacency. Wall thickness is consistent. The main entrance door in the lobby is missing its visual swing/opening cavity, appearing as a solid wall segment in the render.

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture mapping is exceptionally accurate, capturing specific rug patterns and relative seating positions.

aesthetic_quality.notes: High-quality orthographic projection and clean geometry. Lighting is coherent, though shadows are a bit soft for a technical verification render.

detected_errors.description: Missing defined entrance door cavity in the lobby area.
Slight misalignment of the wall separating the kitchen from the utility area.
Proportion distortion of windows on the left facade of Bedroom-3 compared to 2D specs.
